description: Create a random Chuck Norris joke

annotations.value: Generate one original Chuck Norris joke. Do not reuse classic structures like roundhouse kicks, counting to infinity, or glaring-atoms tropes. Avoid tech-centric humor unless it’s genuinely unexpected. Explore any domain—nature, mythology, sports, cooking, art, everyday life, or the absurd. Use a fresh comedic structure and keep it under 20 words with a surprising punchline.
